column4: Is there anyone that can help me with my windows Title bar? It looks gigantic. I installed Emerald to fix this which it does but everytime I reboot I need to run emerald and log out and login again. The problem is that the windows title looks huge!! Look here how it looks: http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?p=4090723#post4090723
Can someone please help me out here; http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?p=4090723#post4090723
How do you leave a PM for someone who is currently offline in IRC ?
that's not IRC specific depends on if the daemon supports it
